title: Add item deletion functionality to admin panel

requirements.text: Add a deleteItem method to the backend main actor that accepts an item ID and removes the item from storage

quotes: Add an option on the admin where you can delete stuff, delete items.

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes a deleteItem function that accepts a Text item ID
Function removes the item from the items HashMap

requirements.text: Create a useDeleteItem React Query mutation hook in frontend/src/hooks/useItems.ts that calls the backend deleteItem method and invalidates the items query cache on success

quotes: Add an option on the admin where you can delete stuff, delete items.

acceptanceCriteria: Hook provides a mutation function to delete items by ID
Successfully invalidates and refetches the items list after deletion
Handles loading and error states appropriately

requirements.text: Add delete buttons to each item in the ItemList component (frontend/src/components/ItemList.tsx) that trigger the useDeleteItem mutation with confirmation dialog

quotes: Add an option on the admin where you can delete stuff, delete items.

acceptanceCriteria: Each item in the admin list displays a delete button
Clicking delete shows a confirmation dialog before deletion
Successful deletion removes the item from the displayed list
Delete button is styled consistently with the existing teal/emerald theme

constraints: Maintain the existing single-actor backend architecture
Preserve the teal/emerald color scheme in UI components
Keep the passcode protection on the admin panel unchanged
